name: AinoBlocks – Gutenberg Website Builder Blocks
author: ElmaStudio

sections.description:
The AinoBlocks website builder blocks are a collection of blocks for the Gutenberg block editor. With AinoBlocks and our Full Site Editing block themes you can create professional websites with ease.

Resources

AinoBlocks WordPress plugin bundles the following third-party resources:

Phosphor Icons
Copyright (c) 2020 Phosphor Icons
License: MIT License, https://raw.githubusercontent.com/phosphor-icons/phosphor-home/master/LICENSE
Source https://phosphoricons.com/
sections.installation:
1. Install the AinoBlocks plugin either via the WordPress plugin directory or by uploading the files to your server at wp-content/plugins.
  2. Activate the AinoBlocks WordPress plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Use the AinoBlocks blocks on your next page or post.
sections.faq:
What are the requirements to use the AinoBlocks blocks plugin?

You only need to have the latest version of WordPress on your website, to begin with. We do not recommend to use the Gutenberg plugin or WooCommerce blocks plugin on your live websites.

What WordPress themes work with AinoBlocks blocks?

Any Gutenberg-ready WordPress theme will work with the AinoBlocks plugin. Since we created the free FSE block Aino theme specifically to work in combination with our block collection we recommend you to use our Aino theme with AinoBlocks.

How do I get started using AinoBlocks?

After the AinoBlocks plugin is installed, you will see the AinoBlocks blocks collection in your blocks library on any page and post. You can now choose a block and insert it into your editor.

Does AinoBlocks come with patterns?

Yes, you can find the patterns inside the pattern library once you install one of our FSE block themes.

short_description: A collection of blocks for the Gutenberg block editor to build professional WordPress websites.
description:
The AinoBlocks website builder blocks are a collection of blocks for the Gutenberg block editor. With AinoBlocks and our Full Site Editing block themes you can create professional websites with ease.

Resources

AinoBlocks WordPress plugin bundles the following third-party resources:

Phosphor Icons
Copyright (c) 2020 Phosphor Icons
License: MIT License, https://raw.githubusercontent.com/phosphor-icons/phosphor-home/master/LICENSE
Source https://phosphoricons.com/

ainoblocks/flexbox.name: ainoblocks/flexbox
ainoblocks/flexbox.title: Flexbox
ainoblocks/flexbox.description: Flexbox container. Use the Flex Item block as child blocks.

ainoblocks/testimonial.name: ainoblocks/testimonial
ainoblocks/testimonial.title: Testimonial
ainoblocks/testimonial.description: Insert a testimonial or review with the option to add author information.

ainoblocks/author.name: ainoblocks/author
ainoblocks/author.title: Author
ainoblocks/author.description: Show a name, a short description text and avatar profile image.

ainoblocks/sticker.name: ainoblocks/sticker
ainoblocks/sticker.title: Sticker
ainoblocks/sticker.description: A circle sticker with a text slogan to highlight featured elements.

ainoblocks/grid-container.name: ainoblocks/grid-container
ainoblocks/grid-container.title: Grid
ainoblocks/grid-container.description: A responsive grid container. Arrange multiple grid items on the grid to build flexible layouts.

ainoblocks/multiple-buttons.name: ainoblocks/multiple-buttons
ainoblocks/multiple-buttons.title: Buttons
ainoblocks/multiple-buttons.description: Multiple buttons in a row or column.

ainoblocks/accordion-faq-block.name: ainoblocks/accordion-faq-block
ainoblocks/accordion-faq-block.title: Accordion FAQ Block
ainoblocks/accordion-faq-block.description: Create Frequently Asked Question's and Accordion toggles with Aino's Accordion and FAQ Block

ainoblocks/card.name: ainoblocks/card
ainoblocks/card.title: Card
ainoblocks/card.description: Insert a card to highlight important content such as quotes or special notices. The card has a box style format that can be customised.

ainoblocks/profile-image.name: ainoblocks/profile-image
ainoblocks/profile-image.title: Profile Image
ainoblocks/profile-image.description: Show a name, a short description text and avatar profile image.

ainoblocks/grid-item.name: ainoblocks/grid-item
ainoblocks/grid-item.title: Grid Item
ainoblocks/grid-item.description: A grid item in a grid container block.

ainoblocks/button.name: ainoblocks/button
ainoblocks/button.title: Button
ainoblocks/button.description: A single button within a Buttons block.

ainoblocks/flex-item.name: ainoblocks/flex-item
ainoblocks/flex-item.title: Flex Item
ainoblocks/flex-item.description: Child block inside Flexbox container block.
